meanings.definition: A person who makes clever or sarcastic remarks.
meanings.sent1: The wisecrackers at the party had everyone laughing with their clever jokes.
meanings.sent2: She is known for being the queen of wisecrackers in our group.
meanings.sent3: The wisecrackers in the comedy show had the audience in stitches with their witty remarks.
meanings.sent4: His reputation as a wisecracker precedes him wherever he goes.
meanings.sent5: The wisecrackers in the office always lighten the mood with their humor.

meanings.sent1: I couldn't help but chuckle at her wisecracker about the boss.
meanings.sent2: His wisecracker during the meeting caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent3: The wisecracker she made about the weather was surprisingly accurate.
meanings.sent4: Her wisecracker was like a ray of sunshine on a gloomy day.
meanings.sent5: The wisecracker he made at the party became the talk of the town.
